urls.title: Flood warnings for England - GOV.UK
urls.description: Check your risk of flooding: get current flood warnings, river and sea levels, check the 5-day forecast or use flood risk maps

text:
You can sign up for flood alerts and warnings for free on the Environment Agency @EnvAgencyNW website. There is also lots of useful advice on how to prepare for flooding and what to do in the flood. Find out more and sign up here:
https://t.co/WTTF5y8xAD

The 5 day flood risk from the Environment Agency @EnvAgencyNW includes a 'Medium Risk' for large parts of northern England - including Tameside - on Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. 'Medium Risk' means flooding is expected - be prepared. More details here:
https://t.co/HUv6QuhwKx
